stateDiagram

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

State1

State1 : State1

state ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(c1) <>

state ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(j1) <>

State2

State2 : State2

State2 : enter / #123; ActionH()#59;\nActionB()#59; #125;

State2 : do / #123; ActionF()#59; #125;

state State3 {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as State3.(InitialState)

        State3A

        State3A : State3A

        State3A : enter / #123; ActionD()#59; #125;

        State3B

        State3B : State3B

        State3B : exit / #123; ActionE()#59; #125;

}

TERMINAL

TERMINAL : TERMINAL

ROOT.(InitialState) --> State1 : / #123; ActionA()#59; #125;

State1 --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(c1) : Event1

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(c1) --> State2 : [guard1()] / #123; ActionB()#59; #125;

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(c1) --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(j1) : else / #123; ActionC()#59; #125;

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(j1) --> State3 : / #123; ActionG()#59; #125;

State2 --> TERMINAL : Event3

State2 --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(j1) : Event2

State3 --> State1 : Event3 / #123; ActionA()#59; #125;

State3.(InitialState) --> State3A

State3A --> State3B : Event1

State3B --> State3A : Event2
Events
settings
